content:
Weinblum family

1 Lewi WEINBLUM                      1756 - 1819 #239 (Herschel) {census family 307}
 + Malka                             c1750
  2o Lieba WEINBLUM                  1772-79 - 1849 #45
    * Juda BINENSTOCK                1777 - 1854 #36
        FAMILY LISTING
 + Seba (Szewa) Liebe                1777 (Simon)
       married 1791-1796
  2x Isaac WEINBLUM                  Mar 2, 1799 Krakow
  2x Nachem Fiszel WEINBLUM          Nov 23, 1801 Krakow - Sep 23, 1876 #310
    + Keila FISCHLOWICZ              1804-06 - Mar 10, 1879 #77
          married Jul 25, 1825 #34
     3o Baile WEINBLUM               1826 #394
       * Israel Sigmond HERZOG       1839
             married Nov 9, 1862 #37
     3x Lewi WEINBLUM                1828 #196 - Jan 12, 1878 #21
    ?? + Maria WAGNER 
    ??  4x Jonas WEINBLUM            Feb 29, 1867 #473 (Szczakowa)
    ??  4o Anna WEINBLUM             Mar 23, 1877 Makow
     3x Pinkus Eliasz WEINBLUM       1830 #267
     3o Schewe Liebe WEINBLUM        1834 #604
       * Jozef BLUMENFELD            1830 #91
           FAMILY LISTING
     3o Chawe Ita WEINBLUM           1834 #605 - after 1890
       * Leon/Lobel / Bezalel Juda STEINBERG  Oct 15, 1836 Wieliczka - Sep 4, 1889 #335
             married Oct 9, 1883 #90
        4o Salomea STEINBERG         Apr 1, 1863 (1864 #858)
        4x Isaak STEINBERG           May 21, 1864 #857 - Dec 19, 1864 #308
        4o Rebeka STEINBERG          Oct 2, 1866 (1867 #429) - 1890-1900
          * Ignacy REICHER           Jun 23, 1853 #289
                married Jun 1, 1885 #53
              FAMILY LISTING
        4x Jozef STEINBERG           Jun 8, 1868 #508 - after 1940
          + Wiktorya ROTHHIRSCH      Dec 23, 1875 #819 - after 1940
                married Mar 19, 1899 #39
           5x Witold STEINBERG       Mar 4, 1900 #143 - after 1948
           5o Zofia STEINBERG        Sep 27, 1903 #634 - after 1940
             * Henryk GRIFFEL        Feb 2, 1895 Podgorze
                   banns Prog.Syn 1930 #879
                 FAMILY LISTING
        4x Beer (Bernard) STEINBERG  Jan 8, 1870 #38
          + Alice SCHLESINGER        Sep 4, 1875 Bielsko - Sep 2, 1901 Bielsko
                banns Prog.Syn 1899 #28,  married Apr 11, 1899 Bielsko
           5o Lilla STEINBERG        Mar 3, 1900 #147
          + Elfride WEINREB          Jan 22, 1881 Vienna
                banns Prog.Syn 1903 #122
           5x Alfred STEINBERG       Jun 16, 1904 #384
          + Hudes UBERSFELD          Oct 12, 1877 #703 - 1973
                banns 1917 #504,  married Oct 21, 1917
           5o Ruth STEINBERG         May 16, 1919 Krakow - Nov 10, 2010 #2045 Paris
        4o Malke Beile STEINBERG     1871 #379
        4x Joachim STEINBERG         Oct 4, 1875 #593 - after 1940
          + Malke Amalia REICH       Apr 26, 1883 Szczyrk - after 1940
                banns Prog.Syn 1903 #108,  married Mar 19, 1903 Zablocie
           5x Edward STEINBERG       Feb 10, 1904 #72 - after 1935
             + Anna SEIFERT          Aug 10, 1905 Dolina - after 1949
                   married Mar 11, 1928 Krakow
           5x Leon STEINBERG         Jul 14, 1905 #510
             + Regina EDER           Dec 14, 1906 #897
                   married Prog.Syn Jun 23, 1929 #870
           5x Jozef STEINBERG        Dec 31, 1907 #925
     3o Nechel WEINBLUM              1836 #505
       * Lazar Nosen GOTTLIEB        1826 #169
             married May 24, 1860 #324
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Salomon WEINBLUM             Mar 28, 1839 #401
  2o Chaja WEINBLUM                  Jul 22, 1804 Krakow
  2x Abraham Jakob WEINBLUM          Mar 14, 1806 Krakow
  2o Bayle Sima WEINBLUM             1812 #76 - 1845 #113
    * Nachmann FREY                  1809-11
          married Aug 2, 1832 #50
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Lazar Hersz WEINBLUM            1815 #36 - 1824 #43
  2x Moyzes Izaak (Moritz) WEINBLUM  1817 #138 - Jul-Sep 1895 St George in the East, London
    + Jetti FRIEDMANN                c1820 Sebes-Kellemes, Hungary - Nov 21, 1884 Vienna
     3o Johanna WEINBLUM             Sep 24, 1838 Sebes-Kellemes, Hungary - Jan 26, 1911 Berlin
       * Albert UHLMANN              Berlin
             married Sep 21, 1873 Vienna
        4x Rudolf UHLMANN            1863-64 - 1936 Berlin
        4o Else UHLMANN              - after 1945 Bracht, Germany
          * unknown VOOS
     3x Max WEINBLUM                 c1842 - Nov 5, 1867 Vienna
     3x Adolf WEINBLUM               1864 - Sep 17, 1866 Vienna
    + Rachel/Rebecca                 1845/51 Poland - Jul-Sep 1911 Holborn, London
     3o Rossa WEINBLUM               1878 Whitechapel, London
     3x Levy WEINBLUM (Louis WEINBLOOM)  May 1, 1879 St George in the East, London - Jan-Mar 1951 Edmonton, Middlesex
       + Annie KRAIKA                1876/77 - Jan-Mar 1943 Camberwell, London
             married Jul-Sep 1910 Mile End Old Town, London
        4o Rachel KRAIKA/WEINBLOOM   Jul-Sep 1898 St George in the East, London
        4o Dinah KRAIKA/WEINBLOOM    Apr-Jun 1900 Whitechapel, London
        4o Sarah KRAIKA/WEINBLOOM    Jan-Mar 1903 Bethnal Green, London
        4o Leah KRAIKA/WEINBLOOM     Apr-Jun 1905 Bethnal Green, London
        4o Beila KRAIKA              Jul-Sep 1907 St George in the East, London - Jan-Mar 1909 Whitechapel, London
        4x Morris WEINBLOOM          Apr-Jun 1911 Bethnal Green, London
          + Doris E M BAKER
                married Jan-Mar 1940 Edmonton, Middlesex
  2o Leah Freude WEINBLUM            1820 #35 - 1820 #26
